review_data.title: Good place for a nice meal
review_data.content: Fourth time I come to this place : Pros: - food is good - service is good - nice and relax/quiet dinner area cons: - menu english translation is not always accurate - the new version might include a bit more choice of meals

review_data.title: Delicious food with very good service
review_data.content: During my business trips I always have dinner at Relais des Arts and I was never dissapointed. The food is delicious and nicely presented, portions are never too small, the service is nice and helpful. I strongly recommend this restaurant for those who like to...More

review_data.title: Nice steak and wine
review_data.content: I've been here for dinner since I stayed in this hotel and It was easy for me to come there. Steak was great and they also gave suggestion of paring wine in which suitable for the steak. I had an Argentine's wine.

I was pleasantly surprised with this restaurant. Service was impeccable and food tasted delicious. The theatre of picking the weight of meat and watching the waiter cutting it for you (we also had to guess the weight, if it was correct or 0.5 above or...More
